detaileddescription.para:
The GType for GntBox.
The GType.

parameterdescription.para: IfTRUE, all the widgets in it will have the same width (or height)

detaileddescription.para: Add a widget in the box.
Set a title for the box.
Set the padding to use between the widgets in the box.
Set whether it's a toplevel box (ie, a window) or not. If a box is toplevel, then it will show borders, the title (if set) and shadow (if enabled in.gntrc)

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if it's a toplevel box, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Reposition and refresh the widgets in the box.
Set the alignment for the widgets in the box.
Remove a widget from the box. Calling this does NOT destroy the removed widget.
Remove all widgets from the box. This DOES destroy all widgets in the box.
Readjust the size of each child widget, reposition the child widgets and recalculate the size of the box.
Set whether the widgets in the box should fill the empty spaces.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the child widgets should fill the empty space

detaileddescription.para: Move the focus from one widget to the other.

parameterdescription.para: The direction. If it's 1, then the focus is moved forwards, if it's -1, the focus is moved backwards.

detaileddescription.para: Give focus to a specific child widget.

parameterdescription.para: The child widget to give focus
